name: Wooded Beach
description:
When the trees of the red woods meet the stones of a pebble beach. When the crispness of the north meet the winds of the east coast. Magic happens, captured on a canvas. Get your piece of magic today. 

This is a pop up gallery quality canvas with the image wrapping around the frame. Each canvas is UV protected and scratch resistant. All the mounting hardware is included with your purchase! If damaged upon arrival, it will be replaced. Satisfaction guaranteed

12 x 16 inches - $99
20 x 30 inches - $199

If you interested in different sizes or multiple panels, please contact me and we can discuss pricing.

Looking forward to hearing from you!


**Please take note that the 12 x 12 will be slightly cropped. the image shown is larger sizes

name: Skyline View of the Sacre Coeur Church, Paris, France, Canvas Photo
description:
The Sacre Coeur church rests on the highest hill in Paris. Many people travel to the top to view Paris, but if you're anything like me, I prefer looking at this beautiful church. Instead of having the same old postcard photo of Paris, show off this unique photo in your house or office. 

This is a pop up gallery quality canvas with the image wrapping around the frame. Each canvas is UV protected and scratch resistant. All the mounting hardware is included with your purchase! If damaged upon arrival, it will be replaced. Satisfaction guaranteed

12 x 16 inches - $99 
20 x 30 inches - $199

If you interested in different sizes or multiple panels, please contact me and we can discuss pricing.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

**Please take note that the 12 x 12 will be slightly cropped. the image shown is larger sizes

name: Arc de Triomphe Paris, France , Canvas Photo
description:
Walking under the Arc de Triomphe is an experience in and of itself. Since we aren't all lucky enough to see this beauty everyday, capturing that experience and placing it on canvas is the next best thing. Close up beautiful detail of the ceiling is the main focus and unlike the standard "postcard" photos you see of the Arc. Now you can thank Napoleon for giving us the Arc and you too can look at it everyday when it's hanging on your wall. 

This is a pop up gallery quality canvas with the image wrapping around the frame. Each canvas is UV protected and scratch resistant. All the mounting hardware is included with your purchase! If damaged upon arrival, it will be replaced. Satisfaction guaranteed

12 x 16 inches - $99
20 x 30 inches - $199

If you interested in different sizes or multiple panels, please contact me and we can discuss pricing.

Looking forward to hearing from you!
